C

changed() - Method in class game.entities.Player
 
changeMusicVolume(int) - Method in class game.Game
Changes the volume of the music, takes readings from 0-100 from the sliders and converts them to 0.01 to 2.0.
collide(CollisionEvent) - Method in class game.entities.collisions.BoneListener
This method manages what happens when a bone registers a collision, if the game's Player object collides with it it will increase their score and they can advance to the next level, if a Bark object collides it will destroy the bark.
collide(CollisionEvent) - Method in class game.entities.collisions.CollisionHandler
This method splits up the Player and Bark collisions and divides them based on what each type of collision leads to happening.
CollisionHandler - Class in game.entities.collisions
CollisionHandler is the object responsible for managing most of the collisions between objects.
CollisionHandler(Player) - Constructor for class game.entities.collisions.CollisionHandler
 
Controller - Class in game.entities.control
The controller object takes keyboard inputs and outputs interprets them as actions that the player character can take.
Controller(GameLevel) - Constructor for class game.entities.control.Controller
 
ControlPanel - Class in game.display
ControlPanel is the entity that displays the control bar and health of the player at the top of the screen.
ControlPanel(Game) - Constructor for class game.display.ControlPanel
Constructs the ControlPanel, setting all the elements as non focusable, initialising the values of the health bar, and adding action listeners.
